MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH27 and EH55 postcode areas of Kirknewton and West Calder. Engineers are onsite removing trees through the overhead lines and we still expect all power to be restored by 6:00pm. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:05pm on Thursday 21st January 2021
